mapper.select: select r.*, b.id as bankId, b.area as bankArea, b.bank as bankName, o.id as orgId, o.area as orgArea, o.organization as orgName from apply_record r left join sys_bank b on r.bankId = b.id left join sys_org o on r.organizationId = o.id where o.id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into apply_record (`name`, phone, profession, accumulation_fund, organizationId, bankId, status, createTime, updateTime) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accumulationFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bank.bankId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
